name: Possusota
description:
With magnetic brain and sodium butt implant, you scuttle around the town with your trusty Spider Slam, stealing vehicles of local delinquents to shield you against your rotten luck.

Join together with your enemies in this game about unrequited symbiosis!

Control Layout 1

WASD = Movement

Numpad 4 = Machine Gun

Numpad 6 = Missile Glove

Numpad 8 = Jump

Numpad 5 = Throw

*********

Control Layout 2

Arrows = Movement

Z = Machine Gun

X = Missile Glove

C = Jump

V= Throw

*******

How To Play
